title: [Creators] O2B Implementation - Integrate FIB Tool in PANDA workflow and data: AutoAdd Locations, Integration and Go Live
description:
Business Scope:
As a user of the FIB tool I want to be able to request availability on different technical plattforms and see the result in the tool to use it for my quotes. For this the FIB Tool needs to be integrated within the PANDA workflow, as well as the data are needed within the configurators of PANDA (first Company Access Easy).
acceptance_criteria:
Integrate FIB Tool into the PANDA workflow
it can be retrieved

The necessary infrastructure data for a company access site configuration are send from FIB to PANDA
FTTH

The FIB infrastructure data of a site are shown according to the Click-dummy within the PANDA GUI when selected
Figma link: https://www.figma.com/design/ZcXl4W55z31REKQaUCDSmc/FIB-tool?node-id=3003-13&p=f&t=MRKdL5MnBnRHukwE-0
